titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of Texas civil rights pioneer Dr. Hector P. Garcia.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate honors the life of Dr. Hector P. Garcia (a World War II veteran, the first Mexican-American to serve as an ambassador to the United Nations, and the first Hispanic to serve on the U.S. Commission on Civil Rights).
